rewrite1:
Please proceed as follows:

For the sixth paragraph, remove any existing highlight formatting and introduce a dotted underline beneath the text.

Regarding the portion you've selected, adjust the Outline level to 'Body Text'. Then, embolden the text and set the font to Arial. Finish by setting a 2.5 line spacing after the paragraph.

As for the third paragraph, set the Outline Level to 6. Change the font color to the hex code #FFFF00, switch the highlight color to maroon, and italicize the text.
